name: Fossil Hunter
description:
Note: Web build is a little questionable, particularly audio/sound effects, if in doubt use download build.

Hunt to complete the T-Rex skeleton the Professor has always dreamed of. A game made in a week for Easy Jam, it's nice and easy to play, no enemies or dying. Have fun :D

CREDITS:

Font: m5x7 by Daniel Linssen
Palette: Lemma24 by Pumping-Lemma
Everything else: by Maximilian Hunt
